About us

App description

Calorie Craft is a food recommendation app that helps users find restaurants and dishes based on their dietary preferences and BMI. We provide personalized recommendations, so you can discover new foods and places while staying within your calorie budget.

Vision and mission

Our vision is to help people make healthier choices by providing them with personalized, data-driven recommendations. Our mission is to make healthy eating easy, enjoyable, and accessible for everyone.

Our story

The idea for Calorie Craft came from our founder's own struggles with weight and health. After years of trying fad diets and quick fixes, she realized that the key to long-term wellness was finding a way of eating that worked for her lifestyle and body. She wanted to create an app that would help others do the same.
